channel.title: Am I Just Going Mad?
channel.description:
For Christ's sake.
I'm working on a map for my mod, and when I compile it, and run it, Hl:2 EP1 (That is the engine that I am using) crashes, but the blurry background is still there. I've refreshed my sdk content, reset my configs, and submitted the map compile log to the interlopers.net error checker. Nothing but a few ignorable HDR errors. [url='https://www.filefactory.com/file/aha3c7c/n/A01A_vmf']here[/url] is the map (VMF). If someone could please check that it works in their HL2: EP1, and then let me know? Or offer some suggestions about how to iron out the error. Sorry, but I can't offer any pics, because the map does not run.
It's like a barbed pole up my ASS!:rabies:

item.title: Am I Just Going Mad?
item.dc:creator: FailCrash
item.description:
^ THIS

Read full topic

item.title: Am I Just Going Mad?
item.dc:creator: Eric_Fong
item.description:
like “map ‘yourmapname’” that should work, but if you use “changelevel ‘yourmapname’” i pretty sure you will get error.

Read full topic

item.title: Am I Just Going Mad?
item.dc:creator: wheybags
item.description:
Try compiling it, launching Ep1 from your games menu, then opening the map by using the map console command. I had a similar problem once that was solved by this.

Read full topic

item.title: Am I Just Going Mad?
item.dc:creator: The_Minotaur
item.description:
Ouch, bad images coming from that.

Read full topic
